patterns: how to start an instant meeting
responses: Make sure you are logged in successfully. Then click on Join Room button and enter room name of your wish to start an instant meeting.
Click on Join Room button and enter room name of your wish to start an instant meeting.
Make sure you are logged in successfully. Then click on Schedule meeting and enter the required details.
Click on Schedule Meeting and enter the required details

patterns: roomname required in same small and capital letters
responses: No Room Name is not case sensitive
Room name is not case sensitive

patterns: how can i set password to enter the room
responses: Once successfully logged in, click on menu button at the bottom and then click on set room password, if you want to remove the room password then leave the roomname space empty.

patterns: how can i invite others to the meeting
responses: In the URL bar copy the given link and send it to the required attendees

patterns: how to switch on a camera
responses: Once you are in the meeting you will see a camera icon on the screen, click on it to switch on/off the camera
Click on the camera icon on screen to switch on/off the camera
Once you are in the meeting you will see a mic icon on the screen, click on it to mute/unmute the mic
Click on the mic icon on screen to mute/unmute the camera
You can leave the meeting and rejoin again or make sure your device is not on mute

patterns: i have joined the room but there is no one
responses: Make sure the room name is correct or wait for the teacher and other attendees to join

patterns: can i change my display name
responses: You can change your display name. Before joining the meeting you will get an option to change your display name.
Meetings can be only recorded by the teachers. Click on three dots button and the third option will be start recording button

patterns: Why are not we able to access the same whiteboard
responses: Whiteboards can only be accessed by the teacher by clicking on menu button in the bottom and then collaborative whiteboard

patterns: Can I create a meeeting without scheduling it
responses: You can create a meeting without scheduling it by clicking on join room and then type the roomname of your choice.

patterns: logged in but not able to join room
responses: Make sure you are logged in and the room name is correct
